mapper.select: SELECT it.influnecer_traffic_id AS trafficId, t.traffic_name AS trafficName, it.percentage AS percentage FROM influencer_traffic it LEFT JOIN traffic t ON it.traffic_id = t.traffic_id LEFT JOIN pipeline_influencer_client_manager picm ON it.pipeline_influencer_id = picm.pipeline_influencer_id WHERE picm.pipeline_influencer_id = #{pipelineInfluencerId}
